amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), add the following new section: SEC.5___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to propose, plan for, or execute a new or additional Base Realignment and Closure (BRAC) round.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds in the bill for a new round of Base Realignment and Closures (BRAC).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ratcliffe amendment (A032) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ratcliffe amendment (A032) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A032) offered by Mr. Ratcliffe.
